title: The Impacts of Major Chronic Diseases on Changes in Healthy Life Expectancy among Older Adults in China from 2011 to 2020.
abstract: This study aimed to quantify the impact of major chronic diseases on changes in healthy life expectancy (HLE) from 2011 to 2020 in China using an age-specific disability weights (DW) estimation method. HLE at age 60 (HLE  HLE  HLE
